articles.title: Netflix's Avatar The Last Airbender Rotten Tomatoes Scores Revealed - CBR - Comic Book Resources
articles.description: The debut Rotten Tomatoes score for Avatar: The Last Airbender on Netflix is revealed.
articles.content:
Netflix's live-action Avatar: The Last Airbender adaptation received its debut Rotten Tomatoes score.
Avatar: The Last Airbender's first season debuted on Feb. 22 on Netflix. It currently sits with … [+3017 chars]

articles.author: A.A. Dowd
articles.title: 'The Zone of Interest's Vomit-Inducing Ending, Explained - Vulture
articles.description: What if, at the end of Jonathan Glazer’s Best Picture nominee ‘The Zone of Interest,’ it isn’t remorse that sends a Nazi officer into a fit of vomiting? What if it’s his own irrelevance dawning on him instead?
articles.content: The Zone of Interest is among the most audacious movies of last year a radical experiment in perspective, limiting the audiences vantage on atrocities while adopting that of the people perpetrating t… [+7327 chars]
